ca.forklabs.javaxpcom.select

Class Filters

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.forklabs.javaxpcom.select.Filters

  • public class Filters
extends Object
    Class Filters facilitates the creation of filters for Selectors.
    Version:
    $Revision$

    • Method Detail

      • attribute

        public static Selector.Filter attribute(String name,
                        String regex)
        Selects all nodes that have the given attribute with the given value.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the attribute.
        regex - the regular expression of the value of the attribute.
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • element

        public static Selector.Filter element(String name)
        Selects all node of the given tag name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the element.
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • and

        public static Selector.Filter and(Selector.Filter... filters)
        Creates a composite filter that selects nodes if and only if all the filters select it.
        Parameters:
        filters - the filters
        Returns:
        true if and only if all the filters return true, false otherwise.

      • or

        public static Selector.Filter or(Selector.Filter... filters)
        Creates a composite filter that selects nodes if at least one of the filters select it.
        Parameters:
        filters - the filters
        Returns:
        true if at least one the filters return true, false otherwise.

      • not

        public static Selector.Filter not(Selector.Filter filter)
        Creates a filter that selects what the given filter rejects and rejects what the given filter selects.
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter.
        Returns:
        true if the filter returns false, false if the filter returns true.

      • css

        public static Selector.Filter css(String clazz)
        Selects all nodes of the given CSS class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the css class.
        Returns:
        the filter.

      • headers

        public static Selector.Filter headers()
        Selects all the header nodes (e.g. &lt;h1&gt; though &lt;h6&gt;).
        Returns:
        the filter.

      • id

        public static Selector.Filter id(String id)
        Selects the element with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id.
        Returns:
        the filter.

      • inputFilter

        protected static Selector.Filter inputFilter(String type)
        Shortcut method to make a filter on &lt;input type="$type"&gt;.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of input.
        Returns:
        the filter.

      • button

        public static Selector.Filter button()
        Selects all button elements and input elements of type button (e.g. &lt;button&gt; and &lt;input type="button"&gt;).
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • checkbox

        public static Selector.Filter checkbox()
        Selects all elements of type checkbox (e.g. &lt;input type="checkbox"&gt;).
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • file

        public static Selector.Filter file()
        Selects all elements of type file (e.g. &lt;input type="file"&gt;).
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • hidden

        public static Selector.Filter hidden()
        Selects all elements of type hidden (e.g. &lt;input type="hidden"&gt;).
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • image

        public static Selector.Filter image()
        Selects all elements of type image (e.g. &lt;input type="image"&gt;).
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • input

        public static Selector.Filter input()
        Selects all input elements of any type (e.g. &lt;button&gt;, &lt;input&gt;, &lt;select&gt; and &lt;textarea&gt;).
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • password

        public static Selector.Filter password()
        Selects all elements of type password (e.g. &lt;input type="password"&gt;).
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • radio

        public static Selector.Filter radio()
        Selects all elements of type radio (e.g. &lt;input type="radio"&gt;).
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • reset

        public static Selector.Filter reset()
        Selects all elements of type reset (e.g. &lt;input type="reset"&gt;).
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • select

        public static Selector.Filter select()
        Selects all input elements of type select (e.g. &lt;select&gt;).
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • submit

        public static Selector.Filter submit()
        Selects all elements of type submit (e.g. &lt;input type="submit"&gt;).
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • text

        public static Selector.Filter text()
        Selects all elements of type text (e.g. &lt;input type="text"&gt;) or all input element without type.
        Returns:
        this selector.

      • textarea

        public static Selector.Filter textarea()
        Selects all input elements of type textarea (e.g. &lt;textarea&gt;).
        Returns:
        this selector.
